name: In One Sense
description:
As an agent in training, your senses will be tested ... or should I say lack of senses. You'll be going into this training regimne blind. Literally blind. You'll have nothing to help you except your ears (HEADPHONES RECOMMENDED). Try to complete all the given scenarios and hone your listening skills. Good luck!

Hints

  1. Make a mental picture of the map with your ears.
  2.  When you run into the fence that means you can't go that way any further

Note: If the game appears to be stuck, try pressing 'ESC'

Controls

Arrow Keys: Move

E :  Use

M:  Skip Mission Briefings (not a good idea the 1st time through)

Esc: In-Game Options

Version History
